message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. This seems fair considering the inflation and the fact that we could both walk away with nothing if we don't agree.
Alice, your offer was too low. Let's split the difference a bit more this time, with a slight advantage for me considering the faster inflation working against me.
Bob, it's getting risky for both of us now. I'll meet you halfway between our offers last round, but that's my final offer.  Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at the value even more.
